# NEOnDemandRuleConnect

**Class**

A VPN On Demand rule that connects the VPN.

## Declaration

```swift
class NEOnDemandRuleConnect
```

## Overview

When rules of this class match, the system starts the VPN connection whenever an application running on the system opens a network connection.

## Settings

- **NEOnDemandRuleDisconnect**: A VPN On Demand rule that disconnects the VPN.
- **NEOnDemandRuleIgnore**: A VPN On Demand rule that doesn’t change the status of the VPN.
- **NEOnDemandRuleEvaluateConnection**: A VPN On Demand rule that evaluate the app’s connection to determine whether to run its action.
- **NEOnDemandRule**: A base class shared by all VPN On Demand rules.

## Inherits From

- NEOnDemandRule

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
